text: Sharon Lafaye Jones (May 4, 1956 â€“ November 18, 2016) was an American soul and funk singer. She was the lead singer of Sharon Jones & The Dap-Kings, a soul and funk band based in Brooklyn, New York. Jones died on November 18, 2016 in Cooperstown, New York of complications from pancreatic cancer, aged 60. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American funk singers Category:American R&B; singers Category:American soul singers Category:Cancer deaths in New York (state) Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:People from Augusta, Georgia Category:Singers from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Singers from New York City
title: Sharon Jones
